ch.unibe.ese.shopnote.core.sqlite

Class SQLitePersistenceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.unibe.ese.shopnote.core.sqlite.SQLitePersistenceManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PersistenceManager

    public class SQLitePersistenceManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements PersistenceManager
    This class provides function to save all lists / items / shops / recipes to a SQLite database
